items.sentence: It takes twenty minutes to walk from the station to school.

If you want to be a newspaperman, you have to be observant.
My mother has been taking French lessons for several years.
My mother went to the department store to do some shopping.
Things will never be the same around here after Tom leaves.
This is a picture of the happy couple on their wedding day.
Many people have asked me if I think Boston is a safe city.
I\'m in the middle of something. Could you come back later?
I don\'t know why we never used to mind Tom\'s complaining.
